name: n8n-nodes-websocket-aws
description: n8n nodes to send and receive messages from AWS API Gateway WebSocket connections

scripts.build: tsc && cp nodes/AwsWebSocket/awsWebSocket.svg dist/nodes/AwsWebSocket/ && mkdir -p dist/nodes/AwsWebSocketTrigger && cp nodes/AwsWebSocket/awsWebSocket.svg dist/nodes/AwsWebSocketTrigger/
